events.author: bill_lauto
events.post: Hi John,We have Carnesecca Hall at St. Johns that holds 6,000, we can squeeze everyone into that building! Great meeting you at the presentation, it was an amazing evening and I was honored to introduce Barrie at the event.Take care,Bill Lauto
events.title: Barrie Schwortz at St. John’s:  From Skepticism to Belief
